name: Lilia (Nay llik, Narmalone, Sthaim, MMaxime, Nyxirum)
name_original: Lilia (Nay llik, Narmalone, Sthaim, MMaxime, Nyxirum)
description:
Lilia is a 4 month school project game made by a team of 5 people on Unity.

In "Lilia" you play a little boy named Thibault who wakes up in night and find his house with no one inside.

Move into the house with your light and your teddy.

And find a refuge to hide.

But dont forget: "You no longer have your place”.

Key Features:

camera:  first person

controls: mouse and key board

type: horror / puzzle game.

Duration: A short game about 15 minutes

  • move: ZQSD
  • manage your hands: right/left click
  • interact: E
  • reduce your stress: space bare

Game by Hooded Eye studio

Team member:

  • Bru Thomas(Prog gameplay, Evenements)
  • Cachoulet Killian(3D artist(Mode and textures))
  • Dinger Mathis(Prog IA, Sound)
  • Dufillon Xavier(Integration,  Lights, Level Design)
  • Maridet Maxime(Rig/Skin, Animations, UI)

ETPA Toulouse, France
